title: Cowboy II BESS
description: Lindsay Precast manufactured 69 custom grade beams for QCELLS' Cowboy II Battery Energy Storage System, providing the structural foundations for Tesla Megapack installation. The project required specialized engineering to accommodate the weight and mounting requirements of utility-scale battery units while meeting aggressive construction schedules.

cards.title: Interior and Exterior Grade Beam Dimensions
cards.subtitle: Exterior: 353.5"L x 45"W x 36"H | Interior: 353.5"L x 27"W x 36"H
cards.description: Producing 23 of the interior grade beams and 46 of the exterior grade beams

cards.title: Custom Rebar Cages
cards.subtitle: Dalco Rebar Fabricators: Precision Reinforcement for Cowboy II
cards.description: Lindsay Precast partnered with **Dalco Rebar Fabricators** for the specialized reinforcement requirements of the QCELLS Cowboy II BESS project. Dalco's team set up operations on-site at our facility, fabricating custom rebar cages directly adjacent to our production lines to ensure seamless integration and quality control.
